main event: Two observers, one in an aircraft and one on the ground, spotted three steady lights which faded out after approximately ninety seconds. The object was tracked moving horizontally northwest.
interesting points: The UFO sighting involved two observers, adding credibility to the report.
The sighting lasted around ninety seconds, allowing for a significant observation period.
The object was tracked moving horizontally northwest, indicating controlled movement.
The lights faded out, suggesting a change in the object's behavior or propulsion.
The report mentions good visibility and clear conditions, minimizing the possibility of misidentification.
witnesses: one in aircraft, one on the ground
